alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 20 at 4:14PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walton County through 400 PM CST... At 314 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Eglin Air Force Base, or 8 miles northeast of Niceville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, New Home, New Harmony, Piney Grove and Argyle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
